column4: what would i use to format and use the 2TB WD20EADS hard drive? it's not showing up in fdisk -l
gparted with partition and format for you
it doesn't show up in gparted
if that doesn't work the cable may be bad
http://dpaste.com/176116/
also "[51134.192904] scsi 7:0:0:0: Device offlined - not ready after error recover"
what does lsusb say at this point?
Bus 001 Device 005: ID 152d:2336 JMicron Technology Corp. / JMicron USA Technology Corp.
i will try something else, brb
I looked around, and didn't find many complaints about that device
you were the one i talked to about the 2tb drive right?
well the usb dock is fine, i just tested it with another sata drive and it was fine
so then i put the 2tb drive in the computer and now gparted recognizes it. but i went to format it and it's taking quite a long time, still not done
if you didn't partition it, ext3 would take a long time
what would you suggest instead of ext3? (and why does it take so long specifically?)
also (it just finished) now it says 25gb of it is in use, what's up with that?
I wouldn't suggest anything different. ext3 goes through your hd. reiserfs, for example, would format it in seconds -- but you still would have to run badblocks
perhaps it carved out the 25 gb for the journal?
ouch, so that's normal?
it's been a while since I've been into that, I'm rusty
gdb: alright, i'll see if everything's working and come back if i have any more problems, thanks
